what: Retrieve Gallery Information from the Art Institute of Chicago API — galleries
title: Retrieve Gallery Information from the Art Institute of Chicago API — galleries
text: Fetches complete list galleries Art Institute Chicago's public API, automatically handling pagination return available records. function implements rate limiting comply API best practices.

title: Retrieve Gallery Information from the Art Institute of Chicago API — galleries
Retrieve Gallery Information from the Art Institute of Chicago API — galleries
text: tibble (data frame) row represents one gallery, containing   available fields provided API.

title: Retrieve Gallery Information from the Art Institute of Chicago API — galleries
text: Art Institute Chicago API documentation: https://api.artic.edu/docs

title: Retrieve Gallery Information from the Art Institute of Chicago API — galleries
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Get all galleries gallery_data <- galleries() } # }

what: Retrieve Artwork Data from the Art Institute of Chicago API — get_artworks
title: Retrieve Artwork Data from the Art Institute of Chicago API — get_artworks
text: Fetches artwork information Art Institute Chicago's public API using object IDs optionally specifies fields return.

title: Retrieve Artwork Data from the Art Institute of Chicago API — get_artworks
Retrieve Artwork Data from the Art Institute of Chicago API — get_artworks
text: object_ids vector artwork object IDs (numeric character). identifiers correspond unique IDs used museum's collection. NULL. fields optional vector field names (character) return artwork. NULL (default), returns available fields. See API documentation https://api.artic.edu/docs/ available fields.

title: Retrieve Artwork Data from the Art Institute of Chicago API — get_artworks
text: tibble (data frame) row represents one artwork columns   contain requested fields. structure varies depending requested fields.

title: Retrieve Artwork Data from the Art Institute of Chicago API — get_artworks
text: Art Institute Chicago API documentation: https://api.artic.edu/docs/

title: Retrieve Artwork Data from the Art Institute of Chicago API — get_artworks
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Get basic information for artwork with ID 4 get_artworks(4)  # Get multiple artworks with specific fields get_artworks(c(27992, 28560), fields = c("title", "artist_display", "date_display"))  # Get all available fields for multiple artworks get_artworks(c(16568, 14620, 20684)) } # }
